QuestData.Title: Lost in Nagrand
QuestData.Description: Hey, $g mister:lady;, could you help me?$B$BThere's this girl I know. Her name's Olgra. Her and her parents went back to Wor'var yesterday. Only, they never got there and no one's seen them.$B$BIf you're heading back out, would you look for her?$B$BShe's kinda my girlfriend.
QuestData.RewardText: Skytooth! My mama and papa....$B$B<The little girl continues to cry over the corpses of her family.>
